name: Fibonacci
description: What is the project about? Fibochain is a future-proof, high-performance public chain with composable and iterative capabilities incubated by the Fibonacci Foundation. Relying on its highly scalable underlying framework, Fibonacci is working to build a customized social ecosystem for the social space and the creator economy. What makes your project unique? Fibochain's underlying framework offers the advantages of a customized blockchain, including an easy-to-deploy modular framework based on the Cosmos architecture, a dual SBFT+DPOS consensus mechanism that supports large-scale transactions, and an Ethernet-compatible EVM development and deployment model. History of your project. Whatâ€™s next for your project? What can your token be used for? In addition to serving as the underlying asset and medium of exchange for the entire network, FIBO grants holders governance rights. The Fibonacci Foundation will initially control platform parameters in conjunction with community contributions, and as development continues, FIBO holders will be able to vote on updates to the decentralized social network project.
